mapper.insert:
UUID
insert into sea_member (username, nickname, password, email, logincount, regip, regtime, gid, points, state) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{logincount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{regip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update sea_member set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, logincount = #{logincount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, regip = #{regip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regtime = #{regtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gid = #{gid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, points = #{points,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, nickname, password, email, logincount, regip, regtime, gid, points, state from sea_member where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, nickname, password, email, logincount, regip, regtime, gid, points, state from sea_member
